HELP
Usage: help [command]
Help searches for a partial match of the entered word, including any spaces that may follow the word. Help alone will give a list of the most common commands in the game.
Examples:
> help magic mis will find the help text for the magic missile spell.
> help mag will match 'magic user' or 'magic missile' depending on first occurrence in the help file.
See also: COMMANDS, SOCIALS
